```{r}
if(expression){
  do something
  do something else
}
```

```{r}
}
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
x <- 1:20
case_when(
  x %% 2 == 0 ~ "Even",
  x %% 3 == 0 ~ "Dicisible by 3",
  x %% 5 == 0 ~ "Divisible by 5",
  TRUE ~ "Other number"
)
```
```{r}
animals <- c("Cat", "Dog", "Monkey", "Elephant", "Dog")
```

```{r}

case_when(
  animals == "Cat" ~ 4,
  animals == "Dog" ~ 2,
  animals == "Monkey" ~ 3,
  amimals == "Elephant" ~ 6
)
```
output elements must be the same

```{r}
x <- 1:20
case_when(
  x %% 2 == 0 ~ "Even",
  x %% 3 == 0 ~ "Divisible by 3",
  TRUE ~ as.character(x)
)
```

```{r}
numbers <- 1:100
case_when(
  numbers %% 3 == 0 & numbers %% 5 == 0 ~ "FizzBuzz",
  numbers %% 3 == 0 ~ "Fizz", 
  numbers %% 5 == 0 ~ "Buzz",
  
  TRUE ~ as.character(numbers)
)
```

```{r}
make_fancy_price <- function(x){
  pounds <- x %/% 1 
  pence <- (x %% 1) * 100
  if(pence > 0){
    paste(pounds, "pounds", pence, "pence")
  }else{
    paste(pounds, "pounds")
  }
  
} 
```

```{r}
make_fancy_price(8)
```
